firstLine.quote: I first met Dean not long after my wife and I split up.
Everyone agreed that the day was just right for the picnic to Hangint Rock -
firstLine.by: Joan Lindsay - Picnic at Hanging Rock

firstLine.quote: Emma Woodhouse, handsome, clever, and rich, with a comfortable home and happy disposition, seemed to unite some of the best bleesings of existance; and had lived nearly twenty-one years in the world with very little to distress or vex her.
